name: Crowned Heads - Paniolo - Especiale 2017
additionalNotes: The Paniolo Especiale 2022 is a 5 1/4 x 52 robusto extra that uses an Ecuadorian Sumatra wrapper over a Connecticut habano binder and fillers from the Dominican Republic and Nicaragua. It is being produced at Ernesto Perez-Carrillo Jr.â€™s Tabacalera La Alianza, only the second time a Paniolo Especiale has been made at that factory; the other one was released in 2017.
